snippet: A small faction of Hindu Nationalists in India and the United States see Mr. Trump as the embodiment of the politically incorrect, strongman brand of politics they admire....
abstract: Small but passionate group of Hindu nationalists in both India and United States have been holding events to celebrate Donald Trump's bid for US presidency; Trump has managed to appeal to Indian right due to way he speaks about issues like terrorism, immigration and loss of national prestige; Trump's stance is very similar to issues prioritized by Indian Prime Min Narendra Modi.
lead_paragraph: A small faction of Hindu Nationalists in India and the United States see Mr. Trump as the embodiment of the politically incorrect, strongman brand of politics they admire.

headline.main: Among Donald Trump’s Biggest U.S. Fans: Hindu Nationalists
headline.print_headline: Quick to Follow the Strongman, Hindu Nationalists Find a Candidate With Appeal
